article_metadata.news-keywords: h&r block, tax, refund, aca, affordable care, obamacare, premium, health, exchange
article_metadata.description: Lower tax refunds meant the individuals and families got more help from Uncle Sam to pay their health insurance premiums during the year than they qualified for. H&R Block said the difference, on average $729, came out of their tax refunds.
article_metadata.title: Affordable Care Act cut tax refunds $729, H&R Block says | The Kansas City Star
